name: Grupo Bimbo, S.A.B. de C.V.
description: Grupo Bimbo, S.A.B. de C.V., together with its subsidiaries, produces, distributes, and markets bakery products. It offers sliced bread, buns and rolls, pastries, sweet bread, cakes, cookies, toast, English muffins, bagels, tortillas and flatbreads, and savory snacks. The company operates Mexico, North America, Central America, South America, Europe and Africa, and Asia. Grupo Bimbo, S.A.B. de C.V. was founded in 1945 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
